From the stack trace it looks as you formatted code. It would be helpful to have
that file in order to reporduce the problem.

Unfortunately, I didn't see when it happened. If I see it next time it happens,
I will provide the source file.

the IndexOutOfBoundsException is caused by the first, because
updateAffectedPositions does not set fOverlappingPositionReferences to null.

The assertion failure is caused by setting a negative length. This may be due to
a negative position offset returned from the formatter (? just guessing).

Unable to reproduce or determine the cause.

Fixed by guarding the setting of Position lengths and offsets.

fixed > 20031118
